text: John Land (17 July 1938 â€“ January 2021) was a British field hockey player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Land died in January 2021, aged 82.Great Britain and England Hockey saddened to hear of death of John Land ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British ice hockey players Category:Olympians for Great Britain
